double clebsch (int j1, int j2, int j3, int m1, int m2, int m3)

Detailed Description

calculates Clebsch-Gordan coefficient

(c) 2003 Thomas Neff

Definition at line 304 of file clebsch.c.

Referenced by amplitudesHOGaussian(), calcexpectprojectedMBME(), calcexpectprojectedMBMEipj(), calcexpectprojectedMultiMBME(), calcOneNucleonOvlapsod(), calctransitionprojectedMBME(), calctransitionprojectedMBMEipj(), calctransitionprojectedMultiMBME(), calcTwoNucleonOvlapsTod(), calcTwoNucleonOvlapsYod(), and initcg2().

                                                                     {
    int nnu, lower, upper;
    double x, sign;

    if(mm3 != mm1 + mm2) return 0.;

    x = 0.0;
    lower = jj2-jj3-mm1;
    lower = (jj1-jj3+mm2 > lower? jj1-jj3+mm2 : lower);
    if(lower < 0) lower = 0;
    sign = lower%4? -1. : 1.;
    upper = jj1+jj2-jj3;
    upper = (jj1-mm1 < upper? jj1-mm1 : upper);
    upper = (jj2+mm2 < upper? jj2+mm2 : upper);
    assert(!(lower%2));
    assert(!(upper%2));
    for(nnu = lower; nnu <= upper; nnu += 2) {
        x += sign/(f1h(nnu)*f1h(jj1+jj2-jj3-nnu)*f1h(jj1-mm1-nnu)
                   *f1h(jj2+mm2-nnu)*f1h(jj3-jj2+mm1+nnu)
                   *f1h(jj3-jj1-mm2+nnu));

        sign = -sign;
    }

    x *= sqrt((double)(jj3+1)*f1h(jj1+jj2-jj3)*f1h(jj3+jj1-jj2)
              *f1h(jj3+jj2-jj1)/f1h(jj1+jj2+jj3+2)
              *f1h(jj1+mm1)*f1h(jj1-mm1)*f1h(jj2+mm2)*f1h(jj2-mm2)
              *f1h(jj3+mm3)*f1h(jj3-mm3));
    return x;
}
